short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integration powered by Big Ocean Telephone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integration platform providing database driven screen pops.  The Big Ocean Telephone app integrates with back-office applications using APIs.  By leveraging APIs the Big Ocean Telephone extension will search any internal database and present the findings in a new window.  The Big Ocean Telephone app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
